pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.1: When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass. …
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.1: When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr2.7:3.1: The seventh section on settling is finished.
